aircraft.value: Viper Strike-3 - AC-1904-705 at Forward Operating Base-2

defect_observed.value: De-icing valve stuck in closed position. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Bleed Air System component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 28/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 30/03/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 02/04/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 03/04/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 05/04/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
